articles.description: Follow live radio commentary and text updates as Ireland play New Zealand for a place in the semi-finals.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: Ireland v New Zealand quarter-final build-up

articles.description: Argentina ended Wales' World Cup journey in controversial fashion during an enthralling quarter-final in Marseille.
articles.title: Argentina beat Wales to reach World Cup semi-final

articles.description: Wigan Warriors wrap up a sixth Super League Grand Final win courtesy of a commanding second-half performance against Catalans Dragons.
articles.title: Wigan beat Catalans for sixth Super League title

articles.description: Qatari banker Sheikh Jassim bin Hamad Al Thani withdraws from the process to buy Manchester United.
articles.title: Qatar's Sheikh Jassim withdraws from bid to buy Man Utd

articles.description: Watch highlights as hosts India cruise to a seven-wicket victory against Pakistan with almost 20 overs to spare at the World Cup.
articles.title: India thrash Pakistan at World Cup - highlights

articles.description: India demolish Pakistan as the most eagerly awaited contest of the World Cup so far turns into a one-sided anti-climax in Ahmedabad.
articles.title: Impressive India demolish poor Pakistan

articles.description: Northern Ireland forward Paul Smyth says he "couldn't have asked for a better day" after scoring the opener as they defeated San Marino 3-0 at Windsor Park on Saturday.
articles.title: 'I couldn't have asked for a better day' - Smyth on NI win

articles.description: Watch the best shots from India skipper Rohit Sharma's brilliant half-century against Pakistan at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Rohit hits electrifying 50 - best shots

articles.description: Sam Kerr scores her first goal of the season as reigning Women's Super League champions Chelsea beat West Ham to move top of the table.
articles.title: Kerr scores first of season as Chelsea go top

articles.description: India's Rohit Sharma punishes Pakistan's Haris Rauf with two huge sixes in an over at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Rohit smashes two sixes in an over as India dominate
